official_title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide for the registration of handlers of precursors and eliminate the exemption from certain regulatory provisions of drugs in capsule form, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Precursor Chemicals Control Act of 1991 - Amends the Controlled Substances Act to: (1) authorize the Attorney General to provide for the registration of handlers of listed precursor chemicals; and (2) establish penalties for violation of such registration requirement. Eliminates the exemption from regulatory provisions with respect to listed chemicals for any transaction in such a chemical that is contained in a drug that may be marketed or distributed lawfully in the United States under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.

titles.title: To amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide for the registration of handlers of precursors and eliminate the exemption from certain regulatory provisions of drugs in capsule form, and for other purposes.
